content: Questo libro è scritto in un inglese molto semplice ed è quindi ottimo per i neofiti.
translations: eng:This book is written in a rather simple English and is thus suitable for beginners
eng:This book is written in a very simple English and is therefore the best for new learners
eng:This book is written in very simple English and so is best for new learners
